Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Reroute at Belmont/Melvina
ShortDescription: 77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Belmont, Austin, Addison, Narragansett and Belmont due to street blockage near Belmont/Melvina.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Belmont, Austin, Addison, Narragansett, then resume their normal route on Belmont due to street blockage near Belmont/Melvina.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed near 95th/Dan Ryan
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are still standing near 95th/Dan Ryan due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are still standing near 95th/Dan Ryan due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

  • #24 Wentworth
  • #29 State
  • #34 South Michigan
  • #95 95th
  • #103 West 103rd
  • #106 East 103rd

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
